DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Many Men , Many Voices , An STD/HIV Prevention Intervention Black MSM
DOC.detailed_description: Black men sex men ( MSM ) United States experience disproportionately high rate HIV sexually transmit infection ( STIs ) ; however , number evidence-based intervention Black MSM limit . This study evaluate efficacy Many Men , Many Voices ( 3MV ) , small-group HIV/STI prevention intervention develop Black MSM-serving community-based organization university-based HIV/STI prevention train program . The study sample include 338 Black MSM HIV-negative unknown HIV serostatus reside New York city . Participants randomly assign 3MV intervention condition ( n = 164 ) wait-list comparison condition ( n = 174 ) . Relative comparison participant , 3MV participant report significantly great reduction unprotected anal intercourse casual male partner ; trend consistent condom use receptive anal intercourse casual male partner ; significantly great reduction number male sex partner great increase HIV test . This study first randomize trial demonstrate efficacy HIV/STI prevention intervention Black MSM .
